Interface TimeTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StudentTimeTable

    public interface TimeTable

    • Method Detail

      • addCourse

        void addCourse(Course c)
        throws CourseOverlapException
        Method for trying to add courses to a given students timetable. Courses can be added under the following conditions: 1. The time table doesn't already have this course on it 2. The time table doesn't already have a course at the same timeslot as this course 3. The time table doesn't already have its maxCourses 4. The time table doesn't contain any of the courses on the exclusion list of this course
        Parameters:
        c - the course to attempt to add.
        Throws:
        CourseOverlapException - this exception is thrown if there is an overlap between current schedule and the course to be added

      • removeCourse

        void removeCourse(Course c)
        Method for removing a course from the time table
        Parameters:
        c - the course to be removed, must be currently on the timetable

      • printTimeTable

        void printTimeTable()
        method to print the time table. This will print to console in the following format: Timetable for [Name of person/room/institute] MONDAY: CODE: CSCB07 Name: Software Design MO 15 - 17 CODE: CSCB08 Name: Software Design II MO 17 - 19 TUESDAY: CODE: CSCB33 Name: Logical Problems TU 17 - 19 WEDNESDAY: THURSDAY: FRIDAY: When printing, courses must be in the correct order as they appear within each day of the week.

      • setMaxCourses

        void setMaxCourses(int max)
        method for setting maximum number of courses that can be taken at one time
        Parameters:
        max - the maximum number of courses that can be taken at once

      • getMaxCourse

        int getMaxCourse()
        method to get the maximum number of courses this timetable can contain
        Returns:
        The maximum number of courses for this time table.
